SummaryEnglish: Banana Island is a place where the weather is fine and pretty, tasty bananas always grow. Baikinman, for some reason, is trying to eliminate every single one of the delicious fruits. Anpanman will have to travel to this distant location to prevent its destruction and the success of his antagonistsâ€™ evil plans. Teamwork and never giving up are the two man topics in this instalment of the popular franchise.
